title: EXT_primitive_voxels glTF Mesh Primitive extension
description: `EXT_primitive_voxels` extension for a primitive in a glTF model to indicate voxel-based volumetric data

shape.description: The index of the shape in `EXT_implicit_geometry` that the voxel grid adheres to.

dimensions.description: Dimensions of the voxel grid. The values are interpreted with respect to the shape indicated by `EXT_implicit_geometry`.

padding.description: The optional padding of the voxels.
